"Ohh? It's you!":
"I heard the news.
You went to Stia, right?"
"Isn't it really rough over there?"

"I heard there's so many DOLLS that
there's fighting pretty much day and night."

"You seem to be alright,
but what about Manon and Aina?"
"They're doing well."
"They're pretty exhausted."
"They are? Thank goodness..."
"What?! Are they okay?"
"...W-Well, that's good, then..."

"We haven't spoken in a while,
so I was pretty worried."

"But seeing you in good spirits
puts my mind at ease."

"We'll be here if any of you need
someone to talk to, okay?"

"It's like I said before.
We'll support you three entirely."
"I'll keep that in mind."
"I'll let them know."

"Yep! Just say the word
and we'll be there."
"We might not all arrive at the same time, though..."
"Yeah, please do."

"It's been a while;
I'd like to talk to them soon."

"...Oh, yeah. I'll give you an update
on how things have been going here."

"According to Ilma, investigation into
Lost Central has been proceeding well."

"The ARKS from Aelio have
been actively helping out."

"We've also been getting
more ARKS from Retem as well."

"Apparently they've been helping out with
research and investigations in addition to combat."

"Grandpa told us that Retem ARKS
were all about strength, but..."

"I guess they're different
from how they were back then."

"Ilma's been sorting out
all of Grandpa's on-site data."

"He said he's been fact-checking
all of the remaining documents."

"But... he hasn't found any other
messages left behind by Grandpa."

"We really thought Grandpa left more
clues within Lost Central, but..."
"He'll find them eventually."
"Maybe there are places he hasn't looked?"
"Yeah. We can't give up hope yet."

"Yeah. Places buried under the snow
haven't even been touched yet."

"We won't let it get to us.
We'll keep at it."

"Along with our search for
Grandpa's clues on rebuilding Kvaris."

"We'll call if we
make any developments."

"We might even need your
help with some stuff too."

"When that time comes, we'll
make sure it's worth your while."
"See you around!"
